subject: I did not receive my order complete
description_text:
I ya e reviewed my order and there was only one box with the pedals, the gear shifter did not arrive.
The tracking label was just one box of one (you can see the label)
I will appreciate if you ship what is missing 


Thanks a lot and regards

Arnoldo Chávez

conversations.body_text: Hi Arnoldo Chavez,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our staff overlooked this item, and we have arranged for a replacement shipment. However, our US warehouse not have the desktop fixed.  https://www.track123.com/result?trackNos=GFUS01015882226753

Thank you but I didn’t followed on message, it was truncated.
I understand you will be shipping the missing gear shifter.
The tracking link leads to an error page.
I look forward to learn more about my shipment.
Regards 

Arnoldo Chavez

> El 27 oct 2025, a la(s) 3:12, service@simsonn.com escribió:
> 
> ﻿
> Hi Arnoldo Chavez,
> 
> We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our staff overlooked this item, and we have arranged for a replacement shipment. However, our US warehouse not have the desktop fixed.
> https://www.track123.com/result?trackNos=GFUS01015882226753
> 
>

Since the U.S. warehouse has not yet handed this package over to the logistics provider, there has been no update. An update should be available today.  https://www.track123.com/track?trackNos=GFUS01015882226753
